About
Us
A crackling wood fire. The sizzle of the grill. And the spark of great conversation.
Those aren’t just the ingredients for a great meal. They’re the soul of Firebirds. You see, we’re a restaurant dedicated to the world’s oldest–and most satisfying—method of cooking.
From Firebirds’ locally sourced hardwoods to its unique cooking techniques, everything Firebirds does honors the power of the flame. Because wood fired grilling brings people together. And its bold flavors set Firebirds apart. So be our guests. We know that once you pull up a chair that first time, you’ll be back. And we can’t wait.
Alex’s Lemonade Stand Foundation
We’re a proud partner of
Alex’s Lemonade Stand Foundation
–working together to fight childhood cancer, one cup at a time. That means that every time someone orders lemonade, we donate $1.25 to Alex’s Lemonade Stand. And because there’s something irresistible about a good old fashioned lemonade stand, we put up our own for Alex’s Lemonade Days. To date, we’ve donated more than $3.5 million, and that number just keeps growing. So next time you visit us, be sure to ask for a glass of Fresh Squeezed Lemonade– you can also
donate here
.
